attributes.action: Make at least half of knighthoods about genuine acts of heroism.
attributes.additional_details: A lot of modern day knighthoods are largely about political contributions which are often controversial. I personally envision a true heroic act being recognised as far less controversial and more deserving too.
attributes.background: Please discuss making knighthoods about what you actually picture a knight doing. It makes sense to recognise true courage in the face of real physical danger.
